title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2411/89 of 28 July 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 430/87 concerning the import arrangements applicable to products falling within CN codes 0714 10 10, 0714 10 90 and 0714 90 10 and originating in certain third countries
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 2411/89
of 28 July 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 430/87 concerning the import arrangements applicable to products falling within CN codes 0714 10 10, 0714 10 90 and 0714 90 10 and originating in certain third countries
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1989.
For the Council
The President
M. CHARASSE
(1) OJ No L 43, 13. 2. 1987, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 340, 10. 12. 1988, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 298, 31. 10. 1988, p. 1.
